message.body: Right. We looked it up, it is illegal to take place without our knowledge.
Then we consulted an attny who verified it is illegal.
Only thing is that we only get compensated that one week back so is it worth it?
We are going to look into partial unemployment

yea. One week partial pay for all of the employees that wish to file with the attorney is a big settlement for us for the company. You figure its not much for 1 person but if we have all 15 of us now thats a bigger lump sum
And patial unemployment wont give you much. Its only 80 dollars before taxes.
But 80 bucks a person for all 20 of us is now 1600 settlement for the company thay they need to pay out. For all for offices they are making 6400 dollars this week that belongs to the workers.
No, I use to work 57 hours. I lost 15 hours after damon, that was about $250 a week. Now im losing another 6 hours @ 20.25/hr. That's way more then $80
No I did the math. It is 80 a week. I promise.
I guess... but $80 a week equals the same as my sat hours so i'd take that.
Yea I know.
Im at SR do you need any necessities?
So now I will hopefully get to work satursays here so im only losing 200 a month instead of 320
Deoderant? I think im low. Oh and sugar
I need to decide what im going to do with oogies and ppm. Like which days would be more beneficial for which job.
Yea I know
I guess oogies fri night again isn't so bad since ill be off sats now. In kind of looking forward to that.
Sorry for what?
Getting you a job at a sinking ship.
Its still not as bad as ccp.. especially now with damon gone.
Yea but you might have moved on to something greater of not for being hired here
I doubt it.
Anything else before I get in line?
Nah
Milk
Milk bread eggs creamer.. got them
We enough salt for snow?
